summary: An individual's tendency to downplay their abilities reflects a deep sense of humility, often using humor to deflect praise and avoid drawing attention to their skills.
When engaging in a passionate activity, an individual can undergo a transformation, revealing their true capabilities and dedication.
Actions and creations can communicate an individual's true talents and efforts more effectively than words, allowing their work to speak for itself.
Consistent practice and perseverance in honing a skill can lead to mastery, which becomes evident in the quality of one's work.
